comments.body: This doesn't include a comment like `-- This test file was converted from ...`?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1,5 @@-- This test file was converted from group-analytics.sql.
-- TODO: UDF should be inserted and tested at GROUP BY clause after SPARK-28445
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW testData AS SELECT * FROM VALUES
(1, 1), (1, 2), (2, 1), (2, 2), (3, 1), (3, 2)
AS testData(a, b);

comments.body:
@skonto, sorry last nit. Can you add a comment, with the JIRA you're going to file at https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/25098#discussion_r305313127 ?

e.g.

```
-- TODO: UDF should be inserted and tested at GROUP BY clause after SPARK-XXXXX
```

It's kind of sad that we can't test `GROUP BY` with UDF at grouping specific test cases ...
Or you can make one test failed, skip, and similarly comment on it like #25098 for now
sure im in the process of doing it let me check, have some connection issues at the moment so need some time.
@HyukjinKwon I added a top level comment as you mentioned.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1,5 @@-- This test file was converted from group-analytics.sql.
-- TODO: UDF should be inserted and tested at GROUP BY clause after SPARK-28445
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW testData AS SELECT * FROM VALUES
(1, 1), (1, 2), (2, 1), (2, 2), (3, 1), (3, 2)
AS testData(a, b);
